metadata.name: Suspicious Registry Modification From ADS Via Regini.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects the import of an alternate data stream with regini.exe, regini.exe can be used to modify registry keys.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\regini.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('regini.exe') AND process.cmd_line rlike ':\[^ \\\\\]')

output.summary: Detects the import of an alternate data stream with regini.exe, regini.exe can be used to modify registry keys.

metadata.objective: Examine fields: process.parent_process.name, process.cmd_line False positive: Unknown References: https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/Binaries/Regini/, https://gist.github.com/api0cradle/cdd2d0d0ec9abb686f0e89306e277b8f, https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-server/administration/windows-commands/regini
